artwork.creator: Currier and Ives
artwork.title: The Soldier's Dream of Home
artwork.subject: Civil war, soldier, daydreaming
artwork.label: During the Civil War a soldier rests in camp, his rifle and letter by his side, dreaming of reuniting with his wife and child. The memories of family and thoughts of home offer a sense of comfort and hope, providing a universally human moment in the harsh times of violence and uncertainty. Published by Currier & Ives, known for popular prints in 19th-century America.
